postFeatureReview.summary: Architecture refactored to separate Guides and Tools content types. Created BaseContentSchema, ToolReviewSchema, and ContentGuideSchema with proper inheritance. Tool reviews now have their own data access layer (toolReviews.ts) and dedicated route (/[region]/tools/[slug]).
postFeatureReview.impact: Changes affect: types (schemas.ts, index.ts), data layer (toolReviews.ts, articles.ts, index.ts), regional data (gb/en/index.ts, reviews/tools/), and routing (new tools/[slug] route). Existing guides functionality preserved via backwards-compatible IndustryReportSchema alias.
postFeatureReview.issues: None identified. All lint and build checks pass. The tool review page reuses existing article components to maintain consistency.
postFeatureReview.recommendations: 1. Add tools listing page at /[region]/tools similar to /[region]/guides. 2. Consider adding tools to navigation menu. 3. Future tool reviews can be added to src/data/regions/[region]/en/reviews/tools/ and registered in toolReviews.ts.
